name: ETNA Software
tagline: quality software solutions to financial industry
description:
ETNA Software Corp., founded in 2002, with headquarters in New York and development centers in Eastern Europe and Asia, is a renowned custom financial software vendor dedicated to providing quality software solutions to financial industry companies.
Our developers' expertise in the latest technologies, as well as experience in developing analytic applications for the capital markets industry, enable us to create a unique, highly scalable stock and options trading platform for SogoTrade, the NASDAQ Platinum Partner. Our platform was featured in the Barron's Magazine on-line trading platforms review with the second-highest rating for Usability.
READ MORE...
